title: 1 Bedroom  $1100!! Available !! $500 off move in cost
posting_body: ['Located, just minutes from Downtown Detroit, Cityside offers the convenience of city living in a beautiful, park-like setting.', 'From 1 and 2 bedroom apartment homes to 2, 3 and 4 bedroom townhomes, Cityside has the perfect home waiting for you.', 'Take a bike ride through the Dequindre Cut, enjoy a leisurely stroll along the Riverwalk, relax at one of the many local parks, or head Downtown for some shopping, dining and entertainment.', 'Whatever you choose, it’s all within walking distance from Cityside!', 'APARTMENT & COMMUNITY FEATURES:', 'Spacious 1, 2, 3, & 4 Bedroom Suites', 'In-Unit Apartment Monitoring System', 'Gas Heat', 'Central Air Conditioning', 'Refrigerator', 'Range', 'Dishwasher', 'Garbage Disposal', 'Laundry Rooms in Each Building', 'Outdoor Swimming Pool', 'Community Clubhouse', 'Parking Permit for Residents', '24 Hour Emergency Maintenance', 'LOCAL ATTRACTIONS:', 'Lafayette Park Neighborhood', 'Downtown Detroit', 'Detroit Windsor Tunnel', 'Belle Isle', 'Campau Park & Elmwood Central Park', 'Dequindre Cut Greenway Trail', 'Detroit Riverwalk', 'William G. Milliken State Park and Harbor', 'University of Detroit Mercy School of Law', 'Downtown Shopping Districts', 'Casual, Fine, and International Dining', 'Sport, Entertainment, and Music Venues', 'Call to schedule a Tour today!!', 'show contact info']
